name: Sokoban (for the Nokia 3310)
description:
Become a Patron!

Controls
  • Arrow Keys (or WASD) to move.
  • R to restart the current level.
Objective

Push the crates onto buttons! Once all buttons are pressed with crates, advance to the next level! There is no pulling, and you can get stuck, so press R to reload the level and try again!

Post in the comments which level you thought was most difficult!
